verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं वो देवयज्यया अग्निं प्रयत्यध्वरे। अग्निं होतारमीळते॥
verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devayajyayā agniṃ prayaty adhvare | agniṃ hotāram īḷate ||
verses.translation_english: Agni do men invoke for worship, Agni at sacrifice duly performed; Agni the Hotar they praise.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिरीड्यो नूतनैरुत। स देवाँ एह वक्षति॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta | sa devān eha vakṣati ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, praised by ancient seers and by those of today, may he bring the gods here.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निना रयिमश्नवत्पोषमेव दिवेदिवे। यशसं वीरवत्तमम्॥
verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one gains wealth and nourishment day by day, glorious and most rich in heroes.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि। स इद्देवेषु गच्छति॥
verses.transliteration: agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi | sa id deveṣu gacchati ||
verses.translation_english: O Agni, the sacrifice which thou encompassest on every side, that indeed goes among the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः। देवो देवेभिरा गमत्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ | devo devebhir ā gamat ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, the Hotar, of wise resolve, most truthful, of glorious fame—may the god come with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: यदङ्ग दाशुषे त्वमग्ने भद्रं करिष्यसि। तवेत्तत्सत्यमङ्गिरः॥
verses.transliteration: yadaṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi | tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ ||
verses.translation_english: Whatever blessing thou, O Agni, wilt grant to the worshipper, that, O Angiras, is thy true gift.

verses.sanskrit_text: उप त्वाग्ने दिवेदिवे दोषावस्तर्धिया वयम्। नमो भरन्त एमसि॥
verses.transliteration: upa tvāgne divedive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam | namo bharanta emasī ||
verses.translation_english: To thee, O Agni, day by day, at evening and at dawn, we come with reverence.

verses.sanskrit_text: राजन्तमध्वराणां गोपामृतस्य दीदिविम्। वर्धमानं स्वे दमे॥
verses.transliteration: rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim | vardhamānaṃ sve dame ||
verses.translation_english: Shining ruler of sacrifices, guardian of the cosmic order, growing in thine own house.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सुपायनो भव। सचस्वा नः स्वस्तये॥
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ piteva sūnave agne supāyano bhava | sacasvā naḥ svastaye ||
verses.translation_english: So be to us, O Agni, as a father to his son; be easy of access to us for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं पारया नव्यो अस्मान्स्वस्तिभिरति दुर्गाणि विश्वा। पूश्च पृथ्वी बहुला न उर्वी भव तोकाय तनयाय शं योः॥
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ pārayā navyo asmān svastibhir ati durgāṇi viśvā | pūś ca pṛthvī bahulā na urvī bhava tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ ||
verses.translation_english: O Agni, carry us safely over all hardships with thy auspicious powers. May the wide earth and heaven be gracious to us and to our offspring.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने नय सुपथा राये अस्मान् विश्वानि देव वयुनानि विद्वान्। युयोध्यस्मज्जुहुराणमेनो भूयिष्ठां ते नमउक्तिं विधेम॥
verses.transliteration: agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān | yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te nama uktiṃ vidhema ||
verses.translation_english: O Agni, lead us by the good path to prosperity, O god who knowest all ways. Remove from us crooked sin. To thee we offer our highest reverence.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो मित्रः शं वरुणः शं नो भवत्वर्यमा। शं न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः शं नो विष्णुरुरुक्रमः॥
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā | śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no viṣṇur urukramaḥ ||
verses.translation_english: May Mitra bless us, and Varuna; may Aryaman bless us; may Indra and Brihaspati bless us; may Vishnu of wide stride bless us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं होतारं मनुषः सपर्यन्ति धीतिभिः। यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniṃ hotāraṃ manuṣaḥ saparyanti dhītibhiḥ | yajñasya devam ṛtvijam ||
verses.translation_english: Men worship Agni the Hotar with their thoughts, the divine ministrant of the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो न वरुणो न अर्यमा स न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः। स नः शिवो मरुतां गणः॥
verses.transliteration: sa no mitro na varuṇo na aryamā sa na indro bṛhaspatiḥ | sa naḥ śivo marutāṃ gaṇaḥ ||
verses.translation_english: May he be for us like Mitra, like Varuna, like Aryaman; like Indra and Brihaspati; like the gracious host of the Maruts.

verses.sanskrit_text: यज्ञस्य केतुं प्रथमं पुरोहितं हविष्मन्तः सपर्यन्ति धीतिभिः॥
verses.transliteration: yajñasya ketuṃ prathamaṃ purohitaṃ haviṣmantaḥ saparyanti dhītibhiḥ ||
verses.translation_english: Him, the first sign of sacrifice, the household priest, men with offerings worship with devotion.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिरीड्यो नूतनैरुत। स देवाँ एह वक्षति॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta | sa devān eha vakṣati ||

verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar, wise and true, of most splendid fame—may he come with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः दीर्घं ददर्श व्योम्नि स्थीतं रविर्भूतः शुभ्रः।
verses.transliteration: agniḥ dīrghaṃ dadarśa vyomni sthītaṃ ravir bhūtaḥ śubhraḥ
verses.translation_english: To him who shines afar, Vaisvanara, shall the bards give precious things that he may go on certain paths: for Agni the Immortal serves the Deities.

verses.sanskrit_text: स ब्रह्मणो व्याप्नोति भूमं दिवं च विशन्तमागतः।
verses.transliteration: sa brahmaṇo vyāpnoti bhūmaṃ divaṃ ca viśantam āgataḥ
verses.translation_english: He, wondrous envoy, goes between the earth and heaven, firm seated as the Herald, great High Priest of men.

verses.sanskrit_text: विश्वा ऋतूनि समायान्ति यज्ञस्योत्तरायणि हि ते।
verses.transliteration: viśvā ṛtūni samāyānti yajñas yottarāyaṇi hi te
verses.translation_english: Sages shall glorify Agni with earnest thoughts, ensign of sacrifice, who fills the synod full: in whom the singers have stored up their holy acts.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निरास्मान् दिवं च पृथिवीं ययात् स्वधाम अनुवर्तयन्।
verses.transliteration: agnir āsma an divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ yayāt svadhāma anuvartayan
verses.translation_english: The Sire of sacrifice, great God of holy bards, Agni, measure and symbol of the priests, hath entered heaven and earth that show in varied form.

verses.sanskrit_text: भुवनस्योषधीनामधि अग्निर्व्यधत्त सुम्नानि रता।
verses.transliteration: bhuvanasy oṣadhīnām adhi agnir vyadhatta sumnāni ratā
verses.translation_english: Bright Agni with the bright car, Lord of green domains, Vaisvanara dwelling in the floods, who finds the light.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्जातवेदसो हन्तारो दिवि स पृथि वर्तते।
verses.transliteration: agnir jātavedaso hantāro divi sa pṛthu vartate
verses.translation_english: Pervading, swift and wide, encompassed round with powers, him very glorious have the Gods established here.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो देवासुरं धत्ते सावितुर्विधें सुकरिष्यसे।
verses.transliteration: sa no devāsuraṃ dhatte sāvitur vidhe su kariṣyase
verses.translation_english: Agni, thou who art established in glory, grant us wealth and lead us to the well‑timed rites.

verses.sanskrit_text: तव कामं समारभं यस्य कामा मद्विदा न ते भुवि।
verses.transliteration: tava kāmaṃ samārabhaṃ yasya kāmā madvidā na te bhuvi
verses.translation_english: He who knows the eternal rites of sacrifice and true desires of men, may Agni grant us strength.

verses.sanskrit_text: यज्ञमुच्चैः प्रतिष्ठां दधन् भागां मागधा न उर्वी समा।
verses.transliteration: yajñam uccaiḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ dadhan bhāgā māgadhā na urvī samā
verses.translation_english: With strong song and noble offering let our rites stand firm; may our share of blessings be wide.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रः स नो वरुणः स नो भवान अर्यमानोऽग्निः।
verses.transliteration: sa no mitraḥ sa no varuṇaḥ sa no bhavān aryamāno agniḥ
verses.translation_english: May Mitra, Varuna, and Aryaman, and Agni himself be beneficial to us.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो देवा ऋतवः सन्तु विश्वे ऋतवस्ति नः सह।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, bestowers of cosmic order, be with us in harmony.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं यो देवमनु यजते तस्य शुभं करिष्यति।
verses.transliteration: agniṃ yo devam anu yajate tasya śubhaṃ kariṣyati
verses.translation_english: Whosoever worships Agni, the divine, shall have blessings and prosperity.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्भद्रं यच्छति ते यज्ञेषु सदा वरुणो वरुणः।
verses.transliteration: agnir bhadraṃ yacchati te yajñeṣu sadā varuṇo varuṇaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni grants auspiciousness in sacrifice, as Varuna ever bestows goodness.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिर्युते देवेषु चोत्तमः। यशसं वीरवत्तमम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir yute deveṣu cottamaḥ | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam
verses.translation_english: Agni, with the seers of old, most excellent among the gods, is glorious and heroic.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो न वरुणो न अर्यमा स न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः।
verses.transliteration: sa no mitro na varuṇo na aryamā sa na indro bṛhaspatiḥ
verses.translation_english: May Mitra, Varuna, Aryaman, Indra, and Brihaspati be kind to us.

verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्मित्र वरुणश्च सन्नो भवतु मित्रवरुणः।
verses.transliteration: agnir mitra varuṇaś ca sanno bhavatu mitra varuṇaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, Mitra, and Varuna, may they be auspicious to us.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो विश्वदेवाः शं नो विश्वे ऋतवः सन्तु।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no viśvadevāḥ śaṃ no viśve ṛtavaḥ santu
verses.translation_english: May all the gods and all cosmic laws be auspicious and in harmony with us.

verses.transliteration: agniṃ yaṃ devam anu yajate sa no bhavatu śubhraḥ

verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar, wise and true, of most splendid fame—may he come with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: यदङ्ग दाशुषे त्वमग्ने भद्रं करिष्यसि। तवेत्तत्सत्यमङ्गिरः॥
verses.transliteration: yadaṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi | tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ
verses.translation_english: Whatever blessing thou grantest to the worshipper, O Agni, that is thy true gift.

verses.sanskrit_text: उप त्वाग्ने दिवेदिवे दोषावस्तर्धिया वयम्। नमो भरन्त एमसि॥

verses.translation_english: To thee, O Agni, day by day, at evening and at dawn, we come with reverence.

verses.sanskrit_text: राजन्तमध्वराणां गोपामृतस्य दीदिविम्। वर्धमानं स्वे दमे॥
verses.transliteration: rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim | vardhamānaṃ sve dame
verses.translation_english: Shining ruler of sacrifices, guardian of sacred order, growing in his own abode.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सुपायनो भव। सचस्वा नः स्वस्तये॥
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ piteva sūnave agne supāyano bhava | sacasvā naḥ svastaye
verses.translation_english: Be to us like a father to his son, O Agni; be easy of access for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्भद्रं यच्छति ते यज्ञेषु सदा वरुणो वरुणः।
verses.transliteration: agnir bhadraṃ yacchati te yajñeṣu sadā varuṇo varuṇaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni grants auspiciousness in sacrifice, as Varuna ever bestows goodness.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिर्युते देवेषु चोत्तमः। यशसं वीरवत्तमम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir yute deveṣu cottamaḥ | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam
verses.translation_english: Agni, with the seers of old, most excellent among the gods, is glorious and heroic.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः सुपर्णो दिवि सविता वर्धमानः।
verses.transliteration: agniḥ suparṇo divi savitā vardhamānaḥ
verses.translation_english: Agni, swift-winged, shining in heaven, grows in power and influence.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः यज्ञेषु पुरुक्षितः।
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ yajñeṣu purukṣitaḥ

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिर्युते देवेषु चोत्तमः।

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः।

verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता पुरोहितोऽध्वरस्य विचर्षणिः। स वेद यज्ञमानुषक्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā purohito 'dhvarasya vicarṣaṇiḥ | sa veda yajñam ānuṣak ||
verses.translation_english: Agni is priest and minister of sacrifice, the Hotar, who knows the ways of men.

verses.sanskrit_text: स हि देवो अमर्त्यो दुवस्यत्यध्वरान्।
verses.transliteration: sa hi devo amartyo duvasyaty adhvarān |
verses.translation_english: For he, the God immortal, duly worships the rites.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्वृत्राणि जङ्घनद् द्रविणस्युर्दधे रयिम्।
verses.transliteration: agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyur dadhe rayim |
verses.translation_english: Agni has struck down Vritras; the giver of treasure, he bestows wealth.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं वो देवयज्यया गृणाना यज्ञवाहसम्।
verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devayajyayā gṛṇānā yajñavāhasam |
verses.translation_english: With sacred worship sing ye to Agni, the bearer of oblations.

verses.sanskrit_text: तं त्वा हि शश्वतीनां विश्वां जातानां पतिम्।
verses.transliteration: taṃ tvā hi śaśvatīnām viśvāṃ jātānāṃ patim |
verses.translation_english: Thee, lord of all that has been born and of eternal generations.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं नो अन्तम उत त्राता शिवो भव।
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhava |
verses.translation_english: Be thou our nearest friend, O Agni, and our deliverer, auspicious one.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पावक दीदिहि विश्वान्यरातिः।
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi viśvāny arātiḥ |
verses.translation_english: Shine for us, O purifier, and repel all hostility.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यज्ञस्य सुक्रतो विश्वानि देव वायुनि।
verses.transliteration: agne yajñasya sukrato viśvāni deva vāyuni |
verses.translation_english: O Agni of good resolve, divine, know all the works of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: यज्ञं नो अध्वरं वह देवेभ्यो हव्यवाहन।
verses.transliteration: yajñaṃ no adhvaraṃ vaha devebhyo havyavāhana |
verses.translation_english: Bring our sacrifice to the Gods, O bearer of offerings.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने सुपायनो भव सचा स्वस्तये सदा।
verses.transliteration: agne supāyano bhava sacā svastaye sadā |
verses.translation_english: Be easy of approach to us, O Agni, for our welfare evermore.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता पुरोहितोऽध्वरस्य विचर्षणिः। स वेद यज्ञमानुषक्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā purohito 'dhvarasya vicarṣaṇiḥ | sa veda yajñam ānuṣak ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, the Hotar and household priest of the sacrifice, knows the ways of men and the ritual.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्वृत्राणि जङ्घनद् द्रविणस्युर्दधे रयिम्।
verses.transliteration: agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyur dadhe rayim |
verses.translation_english: Agni has struck down obstructions and bestows treasures upon men.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं वो देवयज्यया गृणाना यज्ञवाहसम्।
verses.transliteration: agniṃ vo devayajyayā gṛṇānā yajñavāhasam |
verses.translation_english: We worship Agni with song, the bearer of offerings to the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: स त्वा हि शश्वतीनां विश्वां जातानां पतिम्।
verses.transliteration: sa tvā hi śaśvatīnām viśvāṃ jātānāṃ patim |
verses.translation_english: Thee, lord of all that is born and of eternal generations, we praise.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं नो अन्तमुत त्राता शिवो भव।
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ no antamut trātā śivo bhava |
verses.translation_english: Be our nearest friend, O Agni, our protector and auspicious one.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नः पावक दीदिहि विश्वान्यरातिः।
verses.transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi viśvāny arātiḥ |
verses.translation_english: Shine for us, O purifier, and drive away all adversities.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यज्ञस्य सुक्रतो विश्वानि देव वायुनि।
verses.transliteration: agne yajñasya sukrato viśvāni deva vāyuni |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, endowed with good resolve, divine, know all the workings of sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_text: यज्ञं नो अध्वरं वह देवेभ्यो हव्यवाहन।
verses.transliteration: yajñaṃ no adhvaraṃ vaha devebhyo havyavāhana |
verses.translation_english: Bring our offerings to the gods, O bearer of oblations.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने सुपायनो भव सचा स्वस्तये सदा।
verses.transliteration: agne supāyano bhava sacā svastaye sadā |
verses.translation_english: Be easy of approach to us, O Agni, and ever present for our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता पुरोहितोऽध्वरस्य विचर्षणिः। स वेद यज्ञमानुषक्॥

verses.sanskrit_text: स हि देवो अमर्त्यो दुवस्यत्यध्वरान्।
verses.transliteration: sa hi devo amartyo duvasyaty adhvarān |
verses.translation_english: For he, immortal God, honors the sacrifice with devotion.
